benchmark_details.name: DataSciBench
benchmark_details.overview: DataSciBench is a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating Large Language Model (LLM) capabilities in data science, constructed based on a curated collection of complex prompts and featuring a semi-automated pipeline for generating ground truth and validating evaluation metrics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive and rigorous evaluation of LLMs in data science, revealing their strengths and weaknesses across various tasks.

data.source: Curated prompts and generated ground truth based on existing data science benchmarks and literature.

methodology.calculation: Defined through aggregate metrics based on performance evaluations of different models.
methodology.interpretation: Models are evaluated based on their ability to successfully complete data science tasks and adhere to detailed instructions.
methodology.validation: Validation involved cross-references with established benchmarks and expert reviews.
